Replace.Text: That's right, the person standing in front of you is the famous star of Fontaine - Funina. My schedule is very tight, and you are lucky to have an appointment with me.
Alas, being too popular is also a kind of trouble. Who made me so popular?
Tea party is a required course for ladies. If you want to learn tea party etiquette, I can teach you.

cough. With the relationship between us, you don't need to be too respectful in front of me, you can be more casual. Wait, what's that expression on your face? Are you trying to say that you never "admired" me from the beginning?
What a desolate scene, let me give you the blessing of water!
It's so boring. Isn't there anything more interesting?
Hope it is a enjoyable journey.
Good morning...do you need to get up so early? It doesn't matter if you sleep a little longer...
(Fonina de Fontaine's favor for you has increased)
(Fonina de Fontaine's favorable opinion of you has decreased)
The story of "my" has come to an end, and the story of "us" begins next... In this case, should the appearance fee be doubled? So happy!
Sure enough, you still can’t live without me.
You still have to work harder!
Humph, I don’t approve of such an army lacking in characteristics!

She has joy, anger, sorrow, and joy. She is arrogant when she should be arrogant, and cowardly when she should be cowardly... Precisely because she is not perfect, she is the most perfect existence to me. [NewLine]————A sinner’s outpouring of love and apology

I believe that the people of Fontaine have liked Funina from the first moment she became the Water Goddess. [NewLine] Her appealing words and funny yet elegant demeanor all demonstrate her charm as a god. [NewLine] Perhaps what earns Funina the most praise is her unique "sense of drama." [NewLine] Just like the line in the famous play performed at the Opéra Opéra, [NewLine] "Life is like a drama, you never predict which chapter the turning point will be." [NewLine] Funina is also so unpredictable, and it is always impossible to guess what she is going to do next. [NewLine] But it is precisely because of this that this God of Justice and Judgment, who sits high on the throne, is so fascinating. [NewLine] However, just as people feel empty after the joy ends, [NewLine] Has a god like Funina ever been alone and lonely in the middle of the night? [NewLine] People probably can’t imagine it, and they firmly believe that such a scene will never happen. [NewLine]Yes, it should be believed. [NewLine] If it weren't for the spring water of Lujing Spring... silently containing Fu Nina's tears.

The total output of lake cells and bay cells is +1, and the total output of distant sea cells is +2 [NewLine] Pioneers can build cities in the water, and coastal cities +5 [ICON_HOUSING] housing. If you build a city, you will get it immediately. A pure water elf [NewLine] military unit has +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement in water
The sea on earth, the source of all waters

Many Waters: Navigation and shipbuilding skills are unlocked at the beginning, and the output of all water cells is +1. Gold coins purchased in water cells are half price [NewLine] All Fangs: As the suzerain, each subordinate city-state will provide Fontainebleau with + 5% [ICON_CULTURE] culture value + 5% [ICON_FAITH] faith value, cultural city-states have an additional +10% [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, and religious city-states have an additional +10% [ICON_FAITH] faith value (maximum 30%) [NewLine] Public Citizens: Fontainebleau will not be subject to religious pressure from other civilizations. Religious pressure will not be reduced due to the failure of the theological war. Each capital citizen provides +1 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value + 2 [ICON_FAITH] faith value for Fontainebleau. The people of the capital provide them with +1 [ICON_FAITH] faith value [NewLine] Laws of All Laws: Codes, dramas and poems are unlocked at the beginning, and they have 1 general policy slot and [ICON_GOVERNOR] governor title at the beginning.
Queen of all waters, all directions, all peoples and all laws

Replaces the Holy Land, only one can be built, and immediately obtains a great prophet (if possible), providing the civilization with a large amount of [ICON_AMENITIES] habitability, [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, [ICON_FAITH] faith value [NewLine] for all civilizations The theater and its buildings have +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity but -50% [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value output. Every time a new theater is built in the world, it will provide 5% [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value 5% for Opécle Opera House. [ICON_FAITH] Faith value, adjacent outputs of the theater gain the same amount of [ICON_FAITH] Faith value
It is necessary to consume [ICON_CITIZEN] population to obtain an [ICON_GREATWORK_RELIC] relic and [ICON_ENVOY] messenger in the capital
Provides a large number of slots for masterpieces and automatically themed them. Performing plays will earn additional points for great artists, great musicians, and great writers.

Provides power to all cities [ICON_POWER], provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, +1 construction times for all units, and will receive legal compensation for performing plays. The energy provides all cities with production progress equal to the current number of rounds.
Transform into various forms of forest and wilderness, get an [ICON_GREATWORK_RELIC] relic and [ICON_ENVOY] messenger in the capital
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Cultural value comes from adjacent natural wonders
+{1_num} [ICON_FAITH] Faith value comes from adjacent natural wonders
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture value comes from adjacent river
+{1_num} [ICON_FAITH] Faith value comes from adjacent river
"Act 1" The person in the mirror, Funina

If it is Ode to Many Waters: it will provide 1 general policy slot and [ICON_GOVERNOR] governor title to Fontainebleau, and the trade route to the city-state will provide +2 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value + 4 [ICON_FAITH] to the Opéra Opéra. ] Faith value, get an apostle [NewLine] If it is endless solo dance: Recruiting soldiers from the city-state consumes [ICON_GOLD] gold coins -50%, the recruited soldiers +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power +1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power, the recruited soldiers will be there The city-state sent two [ICON_ENVOY] envoys

If it is Ode to Many Waters: Provide Fontainebleau with 1 general policy slot and the title of [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor, the output of masterpieces will be +2 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value + 4 [ICON_FAITH] faith value, and sending envoys will impose 250 on the city-state. Religious pressure, when the city-state converts to religion for the first time, it will get 1 [ICON_ENVOY] messenger [NewLine]. If it is endless solo: killing the unit will release the religious pressure and gain additional [ICON_FAITH] faith value and [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value based on the opponent's combat power.
If it is Ode to Many Waters: Capital +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture value +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith value [NewLine] If it is Endless Solo Dance: Unit combat power +1 (maximum 5)

If it is Ode to Many Waters: Provide Fontainebleau with 1 general policy slot and the title of [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor, the masterpiece will produce double the [ICON_TOURISM] tourism performance, and obtain double the [ICON_FAVOR] diplomatic support from the city-state, the masterpiece will 1 loyalty pressure will be released. When cities from other civilizations leave due to low loyalty, if Fontainebleau has the highest loyalty in the city, it will skip the free city stage and directly automatically join Funina's banner [NewLine] If it is an endless solo dance: +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power when the units are both in a city that believes in this religion
The absolute focus on the trial stage, until the applause at the curtain call.

The world is nothing but a stage. [NewLine]Rather than performing while crying, it is better to perform with a smile, [NewLine] Because only humans can laugh; [NewLine] Let’s laugh, don’t worry, [NewLine] Let’s enjoy today.

Try to make the citizens of each city happy. Love civilizations that do the same. [NewLine] Pay attention to the war to defend the city-state. Admire civilizations that fight to defend their city-states. Hates civilizations that attack city-states.
"The Carnival" has ended and is being settled [NewLine]
"Love is difficult to train a bird, and begging is useless."[NewLine]
"Women are all fickle, like duckweed in water."[NewLine]
"The secret is hidden deep in my heart, no one knows my name." [NewLine]
"If you are not in the dark world, how can you know how valuable life is!" [NewLine]
"I have noticed that his name is...!" [NewLine]
"Listen to my praise and raise the cup of love together!"[NewLine]
That's right, standing in front of you is Fontaine's well-known star-Funina. My schedule is very tight, so if you can make an appointment with me, you are lucky.
Alas, being too popular is also a kind of distress. Who made me so popular?
Tea party is a required course for ladies. If you want to learn tea party etiquette, I can teach you.

cough. With the relationship between us, you don't need to be too respectful in front of me, you can be more casual. Wait, what's that expression on your face? Are you trying to say that you never "admired" me from the beginning?
What a desolate scene, let me give you the blessing of water!
So boring, isn't there anything more interesting?
Hope it is a enjoyable journey.
Good morning...do you need to get up so early? It doesn't matter if you sleep a little longer...
(Fonina de Fontaine's favor for you has increased)
(Fonina de Fontaine's favorable opinion of you has decreased)
The story of "my" has come to an end, and the story of "us" begins next... In this case, should the appearance fee be doubled? So happy!
Sure enough, you still can’t live without me.
You still have to work harder!
Humph, I don’t approve of such an army lacking in characteristics!

She has joy, anger, sorrow, and joy. She is arrogant when she should be arrogant, and cowardly when she should be cowardly... Precisely because she is not perfect, she is the most perfect existence to me. [NewLine]————A sinner’s outpouring of love and apology

I believe that from the moment Funina took office as the water god, the people of Fontaine liked her. [NewLine]Her charismatic words and humorous yet elegant manners all demonstrate her charm as a god. [NewLine]And perhaps what Funina is most praised for is her unique "sense of drama". [NewLine]As the lines in the famous play performed by the Opikle Opera House say, [NewLine]"Life is like a drama, you can never predict which chapter the turning point will appear in." [NewLine]Funina is so elusive, and it is always hard to guess what she is going to do next. [NewLine]But it is precisely because of this that this god of justice and judgment who sits high on the throne is so fascinating. [NewLine]However, just as people feel empty after the joy ends, [NewLine]Does a god like Funina ever have a time when she is alone and lonely in the middle of the night? [NewLine]People probably can't imagine it, and firmly believe that such a scene will not happen. [NewLine]Yes, we should believe it. [NewLine] If it weren’t for the water from Lujing Spring... that silently contained Funina’s tears.

Fontaine cannot launch surprise wars with other civilizations. All city-states are forced to open their borders. When a city is built, it automatically obtains a Renaissance city wall. It is pressured by the loyalty of other civilizations. -99 [NewLine] Funina can actively start a "Muslim Carnival" in each era. ", lasting for 18 rounds (when the special projects "Act 2" and "Act 182375" are completed, you can recharge once if you are not during the carnival period) (When entering the new era, it will be forced to settle and recharge) [NewLine] " "All Carnival" will be held again after unlocking at least one life socket. Members of "Lonely Heart Salon" will be summoned [NewLine]. During the duration of "All Carnival", the spy completes operations (5), completes municipal administration (10), trains units (2), and builds cities. (10), kill units (2), promote units (2), complete wonders (20), destroy cities (20), declare war (20), atmosphere values ​​will be obtained, and the current municipal progress and progress equal to the atmosphere value will be obtained. The capital construction progress is equivalent to 50% of the atmosphere value [NewLine] after the duration of "Everyone's Carnival" ends. Obtain a full output bonus based on the atmosphere value [NewLine] Each time you complete "Muslim Carnival", you will receive a Life Throne, which will strengthen the subsequent "Muslim Carnival" [NewLine] "Love is difficult to train a bird, and begging is useless. "Get 100 atmosphere value immediately [NewLine] "Women are fickle, just like ducks in the water." Obtain atmosphere value +100%, the upper limit of atmosphere value +100 [NewLine] "The secret is hidden deep in the heart, no one knows my name." "Everyone is celebrating. "The settlement level is +1, and the upper limit of the atmosphere value is +100 [NewLine] "If you are not in the netherworld, how can you know how valuable life is!" Members of "Lonely Heart Salon" receive additional effects, and the upper limit of the atmosphere value is +100 [NewLine] "I have noticed that his name That’s it...! "Members of "Lonely Heart Salon" receive all-round enhancements (can be stacked), +1 movement, +1 range, +1 vision, +2 combat power, and upper limit of atmosphere value +100 [NewLine] "Listen to me, everyone. Let's raise the cup of love together!" The attacks of "Lonely Heart Salon" members will cause additional damage of 10% of the current atmosphere value, and the upper limit of the atmosphere value will be increased to 1000.

Fontaine cannot launch surprise wars with other civilizations, and all city-states are forced to open their borders. When a city is established, Renaissance walls are automatically obtained. The city is under pressure from the loyalty of other civilizations -99 [NewLine] Fontaine can actively start a "Mass Carnival" every era, which lasts for 18 turns (when the special projects "Act 2" and "Act 182375" are completed, a recharge can be performed if it is not during the Mass Carnival) (entering the new era will be a mandatory settlement and recharge) [NewLine] After at least one constellation is unlocked, the "Mass Carnival" will be held again to summon members of the "Lonely Heart Salon" [NewLine] During the duration of the "Mass Carnival", spies will obtain atmosphere value when completing actions, completing municipal affairs, training units, building cities, killing units, destroying cities, and declaring war, and will obtain current municipal progress equal to the atmosphere value and capital construction progress equal to 50% of the atmosphere value [NewLine] After the duration of the "Mass Carnival" ends. Get a full output bonus based on the atmosphere value [NewLine] Each time you complete a "Massive Carnival", you will get a constellation, which will strengthen the next "Massive Carnival" [NewLine] "Love is a hard bird to train, and begging is useless." [NewLine] "Women are fickle, just like duckweed in the water." [NewLine] "The secret is hidden in my heart, and no one knows my name." [NewLine] "If I hadn't been in the underworld, how would I know the value of life!" [NewLine] "I have already noticed that his name is...!" [NewLine] "Listen to my song, everyone, let's raise the cup of love together!"

Including Lord Uther, Miss Sherbeleda, Lady Hevimar, and the singers of the waters who only come on Wednesday, they are summoned after opening "Carnival of All" (at least one life seat must be unlocked), and continue until the end of "Carnival of All"
Endless Solo Dance II: Killing a unit will release religious pressure and gain additional [ICON_FAITH] faith value and [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value based on the opponent's combat power.
Endless Solo Dance II:+{+1_Amout}[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Endless Solo Dance IV: +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power when both units are in a city that believes in this religion

Attack +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, and can cause 15 splash damage. After completing "If you are not in the netherworld, how can you know how valuable life is!", it will cause 25 damage to all surrounding enemy units at the beginning of the round.

After completing "If you are not in the netherworld, how can you know how valuable life is!" At the beginning of the round, all enemy units that have caused damage within a two-block area will be automatically targeted to inflict 5+10% of the lost health as damage.
+1 attack times. After completing "If you are not in the underworld, how can you know the value of life!", each unit in the two-square range at the start of the turn has +1 movement this turn

Defense +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power +1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power for surrounding friendly units. After completing "How can you know how valuable it is if you are not in the netherworld!", at the beginning of the round, the surrounding units will be within two cells. friendly unit recovers 25 health points and gives 1 experience point
Cannot be trained or promoted. Appears after opening the Carnival (need to unlock at least one life zodiac) and lasts for 18 rounds.
Untrainable, unpromotable, appears after starting the Carnival (at least one constellation must be unlocked), lasts for 18 rounds
Cannot be trained or promoted. Appears after opening the Carnival (need to unlock at least one life throne) and lasts for 18 rounds.
Cannot be trained or promoted. Appears after opening the Carnival (need to unlock at least one life zodiac) and lasts for 18 rounds.

"In the real world, we have seen too many flowers that are bound to wither, rain that cannot be avoided, and ships that have sunk for a long time...[NewLine]"But apart from these helplessness, I think someone should believe-[ NewLine] "At least in drama, people can control their fate."

The lights of the world were reflected in the lake, and her longing caused ripples in the still water. [NewLine] If the price is only loneliness, then let this desire flow freely... [NewLine] Flow into the world she is looking at, and into her eyes as clear as lake water.
From Endless Solo Dance I: +5[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
From Endless Solo Dance IV: +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power when units are both in cities that believe in this religion
Singer of Waters Defense +5[ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength
"I have noticed that his name is...!" +2[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Singer of Waters provides +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength
